summary: Transcription model for Lucien Peraire's handwriting (French, 20th century)
description: This model was trained on the peraire-ground-truth dataset (v.2.0.0) and using [Manu McFrench](https://zenodo.org/record/6657809) as a base model. The peraire-ground-truth dataset contains documents written in French by Lucien Peraire in the late 1920s and in the late 1960s. For more details on the dataset and the transcription guidelines, see https://github.com/alix-tz/peraire-ground-truth
name: peraire2_ft_MMCFR.mlmodel
